qrList.label: üìî Journal: Guided
qrList.title: Three-step guided reflection with prompts. Choose to save or get AI feedback.

qrList.label: ü§ñ Journal: AI-Adaptive
qrList.title: AI generates personalized follow-up questions based on your responses. Uses configured journaling profile or current profile. Choose to save or get AI feedback.

qrList.label: ‚úçÔ∏è Journal: Free Write
qrList.title: Open space for unstructured journaling. Write freely, then choose to save or get AI feedback.
qrList.message:
/input rows=8 I'm here to listen. Take your time and share whatever's on your mind‚Äîthoughts, feelings, experiences, anything. | /setvar key=freewrite {{pipe}} | /getvar freewrite | /len | /if left={{pipe}} rule=eq right=0 {: /abort :} | /send **Journal Entry - {{date}} {{time}}**

{{getvar::freewrite}} | /setglobalvar key=journalOptions ["Send to AI", "Just Save"] | /buttons labels=journalOptions What would you like to do? | /setvar key=choice {{pipe}} | /getvar choice | /len | /if left={{pipe}} rule=eq right=0 {: /abort :} | /flushvar freewrite | /if left={{getvar::choice}} rule=eq right="Send to AI" {: /trigger :} | /flushvar choice

qrList.label: üöß What's Blocking Me?
qrList.title: AI identifies obstacles (internal, external, blind spots) and suggests concrete next steps.
qrList.message: /gen lock=on Based on everything we've discussed, identify what might be blocking {{user}} right now. Consider internal obstacles (mindset, emotions, habits), external obstacles (circumstances, resources), and potential blind spots they might not see. Then suggest 2-3 concrete next steps they could take. | /sendas name={{char}} {{pipe}}

qrList.label: üîç Insights & Patterns
qrList.title: Requests analysis of recurring patterns, personality traits, and insights from your conversations.
qrList.message: /gen lock=on Based on everything we've discussed, identify: (1) recurring patterns and themes, (2) key personality traits and communication styles, and (3) any important insights about {{user}}'s thinking. | /sendas name={{char}} {{pipe}}

qrList.label: üìä Recap & Reflect
qrList.title: Summarizes recent conversations, highlighting themes, emotional shifts, and progress.
qrList.message: /input Recap last __ days | /setvar key=days {{pipe}} | /gen lock=on Recap the last {{getvar::days}} days of our discussion. Highlight key themes, emotional shifts, progress, and areas for reflection. | /sendas name={{char}} {{pipe}} | /flushvar days

qrList.label: ‚öôÔ∏è Set Journaling Profile
qrList.title: Choose which AI profile generates your journal questions. Configure once, change anytime.
qrList.message: /input Enter the name of the connection profile you want to use for AI questions: | /setglobalvar key=journaling_profile {{pipe}} | /getglobalvar journaling_profile | /len | /if left={{pipe}} rule=eq right=0 {: /echo Profile setup cancelled. | /abort :} | /echo Your journaling AI questions connection profile has been set to: {{getglobalvar::journaling_profile}}
